meanings.sent1: The unensured car repairs were a financial burden for the family.
meanings.sent2: She felt unensured when she realized her phone was not protected.
meanings.sent3: The unensured picnic turned into a disaster when it started raining.
meanings.sent4: His unensured health was like walking on a tightrope without a safety net.
meanings.sent5: The unensured house was vulnerable to unexpected damages.

meanings.sent1: The unensured driver had to pay for the damages out of pocket.
meanings.sent2: Being unensured can lead to financial difficulties in case of emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The unensured pet caused a commotion at the vet's office.
meanings.sent4: Her unensured belongings felt exposed and unprotected.
meanings.sent5: Living unensured meant taking risks without a safety net.
